CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 16 In the McCulloch group , in addition , a hole mobility of 0.24 cm^2 V -1 S^-1 and a PCE of 2.2% were reported in a polymer containing benzo[1,2-b:3,4-b′:5,6-d′]trithiophene ( BTT ) to produce effective intermolecular packing characteristics.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. McCulloch group
2. polymer
3. benzo[1,2-b:3,4-b′:5,6-d′]trithiophene (BTT)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. BTT (benzo[1,2-b:3,4-b′:5,6-d′]trithiophene)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name", presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BTT (benzo[1,2-b:3,4-b′:5,6-d′]trithiophene) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 16 In the McCulloch group , in addition , a hole mobility of 0.24 cm^2 V -1 S^-1 and a PCE of 2.2% were reported in a polymer containing benzo[1,2-b:3,4-b′:5,6-d′]trithiophene ( BTT ) to produce effective intermolecular packing characteristics.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. Hole mobility: 0.24 cm^2 V^-1 S^-1
2. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency): 2.2%

These are the values of the properties of the materials mentioned in the paragraph, which are being reported or discussed.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties:

1. Hole mobility: 0.24 cm^2 V^-1 S^-1
2. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency): 2.2%

These are the values of the material properties that are being reported or discussed in the paragraph.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
